credit_line: Gift of Professor Edgar J. Banks and Dr. John Henry Haynes, Class of 1876
title: Brick from the Ziggurat of Shalmaneser III
description: Incribed clay brick of Shalmaneser III off the outer face of the ziggurat at Nimrud. Cuneiform script in Akkadian.
inscriptions: cuneiform inscription: "Shalmaneser, the great king, strong king, king of the world, king of Assyria, son of Ashurnasirpal, the great king, strong king, king of the world, king of Assyria, son of Tukulti-Ninurta, king of the world, king of Assyria. Construction of the ziggurat of Kalhu."
